content: how cute aren t these so small and tiny for a baby s feet and super easy and fast to make in this pattern you will see how to make baby booties that are warm cozy and super cute so if you are in need of a quick crochet project for a baby then you have come to the right place materials yarn 1 paintbox yans chenille hook 5 0mm ribbon for bow optional gauge 12 single_crochet = 10 cm 4 this pattern comes in the following sizes 0-3m / 3-6m / 6-9m /9-12m please note that all sizes are approx sizes
